anti-social-behaviour.reason: Psychic pokemon are able to read and calm minds!

bicycle-theft.reason: Flying pokemon are able to fly and track the thief!

burglary.reason: Fighting pokemon are able to beat the burglar in close quarter combat!

criminal-damage-arson.reason: Water pokemon can put out the fire!

drugs.reason: Poison pokemon can detect drugs and create antidotes!

possession-of-weapons.reason: Ghost pokemon can't be hurt by corporeal weapons!

public-order.reason: Grass pokemon can put people to sleep!

robbery.reason: Electric pokemon can stun the assailant!

shoplifting.reason: Ice pokemon can freeze the shoplifter in place!

theft-from-the-person.reason: Normal pokemon can stop theft from the person!

vehicle-crime.reason: Dragon pokemon can fly and stop a car!

violent-crime.reason: Fairy pokemon can turn any cruel person into a nice one!
